name: Darkwood Forest
description: Ancient oak and elm trees tower overhead, their thick canopy filtering sunlight into dancing patterns on the forest floor. The air is rich with the scent of moss and decay, while distant bird calls echo through the shadowy depths.

common.name: medicinal_herbs
common.description: Useful herbs that can be brewed into healing potions.

common.name: sturdy_wood
common.description: Strong branches suitable for crafting or repairs.

uncommon.name: rare_mushrooms
uncommon.description: Exotic fungi prized by alchemists and healers.

rare.name: ancient_bark
rare.description: Bark from trees that have stood for centuries, imbued with natural magic.

random_events.name: Lost Merchant
random_events.description: You encounter a merchant who has lost his way. His cart is stuck in the mud, and wolves circle nearby.

help_merchant.description: The grateful merchant rewards you for your kindness.

take_goods.description: You take what you can carry, leaving the merchant to his fate.

random_events.name: Forgotten Shrine
random_events.description: Hidden among the roots of a massive oak stands an ancient shrine to a forgotten god. Moss-covered offerings lie scattered about.

pray.description: You feel the blessing of the old gods upon you.

leave_offering.description: Your respectful gesture is noted by unseen powers.

random_events.name: Bandit Cache
random_events.description: You discover a concealed cache of supplies hidden beneath a fallen log. It appears to be a bandit stash.

search_cache.description: You find useful supplies, but hear voices approaching...

special_locations.name: Sacred Grove
special_locations.description: A circular clearing where ancient druids once held their ceremonies.

rest_spots.name: Travelers' Clearing
rest_spots.description: A well-used clearing with the remains of old campfires.

rest_spots.name: Hollow Tree
rest_spots.description: A massive hollow tree trunk provides shelter from the elements.
